thread.title: The MTV EMAs to be held in London for the first time in 21 years
thread.title_full: The MTV EMAs to be held in London for the first time in 21 years

author: Lizzie Edmonds
title: The MTV EMAs to be held in London for the first time in 21 years
text:
Presenter Bebe Rexha keeps all eyes on the crowd as she performs Peter Dejong/AP 
Jaden Smith poses for photographers upon arrival Vincent Jannink/AP 
Charli XCX works a pink two-piece APVincent Jannink/AP 
Presenter Laura Whitmore flashes her legs as she arrives to host the event Vincent Jannink/AP 
Geordie Shore star Charlotte Crosby works a little black dress AP 
Tallia Storm poses for photographers Vincent Jannink/AP 
Actress Nina Dobrev looks stunning in a purple gown Michael Kooren/Reuters 
Zara Larsson wows the crowd Ian West/PA 
Bebe Rexha in one of many outfits from the night Ian West/PA 
Model Jourdan Dunn poses for the cameras Vincent Jannink/AP 
Deepika Padukone flashes a leg in a striking gown Vincent Jannink/AP 
Tinie Tempah works the cameras Vincent Jannink/AP 
The Weekend posing with his award for Best Video Vincent Jannink/AP 
“London is the natural city to host one of the greatest musical shows on earth — with our exceptional musical history, wealth of creative talent and outstanding venues — we’re the entertainment capital of the world.” 
David Lynn, chief executive of MTV parent company Viacom International Media Networks, said: “London is arguably the world’s musical epicentre and it’s both a huge privilege and opportunity to bring the MTV EMAs 2017 to the UK’s capital city.” Green Day, Justin Bieber and Shawn Mendes win big at the MTV Europe Music Awards 
The awards were first held in Berlin in 1994 and came to London in 1996 when they were held at Alexandra Palace. Later British host cities included Edinburgh, Liverpool, Belfast and Glasgow. 
Speaking at MTV’s Camden HQ, Mr Khan said: “I think we are the entertainment capital of the world. There was a view after Brexit that we were going to stop being outward-looking, a concern we would be insular and no longer the city we are known for. Read more
